info.author: Stanley Engle
info.description:
+++++++++++
Two-Percent
+++++++++++

Provides functionality to accomplish simple tasks.

Why Two-Percent?
================

There are times when this Python programmer notices snippets of code repeated 
over and over.  Examples include: opening files, reading a CSV file, 
writing a CSV file, retrieving a file via FTP, etc.  Instead of constantly 
violating the DRY (Don't repeat yourself) concept, I decided that I would 
write a package that contains simple functionality that may be provided to 
other Python scripts, modules, or packages.  

My goal is to spend less time on the easy stuff and more time on the new 
stuff.  As I continue to write code, I'll add new functionality to this 
package if I notice repetition.  Above all, this package is, and should 
remain a general purpose utility.

Requirements
============

Core
----

 * Python 2.7+
info.name: two-percent
info.summary: A package that provides tools to make simple tasks faster.
